articles.title: Emergency: Kangana Ranaut is 'happy' to step in as director again after Manikarnika for film on Indira Gandhi - PINKVILLA
articles.description: On Wednesday, actress Kangana Ranaut began prepping to get into the skin of the Iconic leader Indira Gandhi for a film titled Emergency on her life. Now, Kangana has also revealed that she will be directing the film too.
